pages.text: Mill can mill things into some form of enriched materials, for example: it mills wheat into flour, refines crude salt into table salt, extract oil from various crops, and make soy milk with water and soybean. $(br2)Mill does not have GUI; everything must be done through direct interacting in world or other automation tools. $(em)Right click with items$() to put stuff into it. $(em)Right click
$(em)with empty hand$() will cause mill to work for one cycle. $(br)Mill is able to auto-eject products to adjacent inventories that are not vanilla dispensers. $(br)(Turn next page ->)
Pushing millstone is $(italic)exhausting$(); however, fortunately, mill may be automated by using anything that simulates player right-clicking, for example $(l:misc/wooden_arm)wooden arm$().
